messages.msgSnippet: Same thing happened to me, it took me a looong time, and I kept trying every day and finally *poof* it just took my original info. Dont know why, but drove me
messages.messageBody:
Same thing happened to me, it took me a looong time, and I kept trying every
day and finally *poof* it just took my original info. Dont know why, but
drove me nuts!
Tami


>From: "Johanna" <saninocencio1@...>
>Reply-To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
>Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] yahoogroups
>Date: Sat, 28 Apr 2001 23:31:09 -0500
>
>Help any techies out there. I signed up for an e-mail address through yahoo
>and now if I want to join any groups it won't let me use this address. I
>have tried listing it as the alternate address but it seems to only
>recognize the yahoo account. Also when the egroups transferred over I think
>I was assigned a different user name and cannot recall it. When it gives me
>the list of groups I have subscribed to this one is not on there. Help!!!
>Johanna
>Life is the ultimate learning experience!
>
>

>

messages.subject: yahoogroups
messages.msgSnippet: Help any techies out there. I signed up for an e-mail address through yahoo and now if I want to join any groups it won t let me use this address. I have tried
messages.messageBody:
Help any techies out there. I signed up for an e-mail address through yahoo and now if I want to join any groups it won't let me use this address. I have tried listing it as the alternate address but it seems to only recognize the yahoo account. Also when the egroups transferred over I think I was assigned a different user name and cannot recall it. When it gives me the list of groups I have subscribed to this one is not on there. Help!!!
Johanna
Life is the ultimate learning experience!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
